title: Fuel Pressure Regulator - Installation

body.body: Install new O-rings to the fuel pressure regulator.
Apply a small amount of grease, conforming to NLGI 2 specification, to the two O-rings.
Position the fuel pressure regulator squarley to the fuel pump plate and press it evenly into its housing.
Secure the fuel pressure regulator with a new circlip.
Refit the hose and secure with the hose clip. Check for any fuel leaks and rectify if necessary.

Refit the fuel pump assembly D series D34; D54; D64; D72; D92; DA2; DB; DB2; DB4; DBB; DBX; DC4; DCZ; DD2; DD4; DE; DE2; DEX; DF; DF2; DF4; DG4; DP; DP2; DP3; DP4; DPA; DPZ; DT3; DT4; DTB; DTC; DU; DU3; DU4; DUB; DUC; DUY; DZ; DZA
